# Functions

The main functions module provides access to all built-in Pixeltable functions for data transformation and AI integration.

*Documentation for specific functions in this module will be automatically generated from the codebase.*

## Usage

```python
import pixeltable as pxt

# Access the functions module directly
pxt.functions.<submodule>.<function_name>(...)
```

## Available Submodules

See the sidebar for a complete list of available function modules, including AI model integrations, data processing utilities, and specialized functions for different data types.
